title: The Lakers Remember Kobe, All-Star Game Changes, and Trade Deadlines | Heat Check
description:
Instant Replay: The Lakers' touching tribute to Kobe Bryant, Damian Lillard's amazing streak, and the impressive run from the Raptors (3:05).
The Main Event: Trade deadlines, along with main contenders and the Knicks pulling off yet another chef's kiss (19:32).
Good Call/Bad Call: Changing the All-Star game format, snubs, and Aaron Gordon getting in the action (35:31).
Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Haley O’Shaughnessy, Dan Devine

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
